title: Digital Learning Innovation Based on Social Cognitive Neuroscience: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic instructional design theories and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: A project-based assessment course where in-service professionals use virtual classroom simulations, adaptive feedback systems, and reflective learning tools in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Implement three or more digital learning design strategies based on sociocognitive neuroscience principles
Design lessons using learner engagement techniques in a virtual classroom simulation environment with 80% or higher completion fidelity
Develop and apply learner-customized assessment rubrics through an adaptive feedback system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
